sections.text: Shares of stock in any corporation organized under the laws of the United States, any of the states thereof, any foreign country or any province or other political subdivision thereof held by a fiduciary may be voted by such fiduciary by general or limited pr

sections.heading: on bond allowed as expense.Any fiduciary required to give a suretyship obligation may include as a part of the expense of executing the trust the lawful premium paid a surety corporation for executing the obligation
sections.text: on bond allowed as expense.Any fiduciary required to give a suretyship obligation may include as a part of the expense of executing the trust the lawful premium paid a surety corporation for executing the obligation.

sections.heading: Wisconsin Statutes updatedthrough 2025 Wis
sections.text: Act 82 and through all Supreme Court Orders and Controlled Substances Board Orders filed before and in effect on January 30, 2026.Published andcertifiedunder s. 35.18. Changes effective after January 30, 2026, are designated by NOTES.(Published 1-30-26)
